entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 7:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
